# AI-Generated Code Test Case Template

Identifier
- Module/endpoint/component, ID

Purpose
- What behaviour is validated and why

Preconditions
- Environment, data setup, mocks/stubs

Steps
- Step-by-step actions

Assertions
- Outputs: values, schemas/contracts
- Logs: expected error/info entries
- Side effects: resource/state changes

Negative and Edge Cases
- Invalid inputs, boundary values, malformed payloads

Error Path Validation
- Specific exceptions, messages, status codes
- Cleanup behaviour on errors (files, connections)

Type Safety Checks
- Mismatches, conversions, null handling

Concurrency Scenario (if applicable)
- Setup, concurrent actions, expected ordering/synchronization

Security Checks (if applicable)
- Injection attempts, auth/authorisation enforcement

Resources
- Acquisition and release verification

Result
- Pass/Fail, defects filed
